explains: adj. （病症等）先天的，天生的；（特定性格等）与生俱来的，生性的
wordGroup: congenital heart disease 先天性心脏病
congenital defect 先天性缺陷（等于birth defect）

sentences.en: He was a congenital liar and usually in debt.
sentences.cn: 他曾是个天生的说谎者并经常欠债。

sentences.en: When John was 17, he died of congenital heart disease.
sentences.cn: 约翰在17岁那年死于先天性心脏病。

sentences.en: Babies with congenital blockages that prevent this fluid from escaping from their lungs are sometimes born with deformed lungs.
sentences.cn: 有的婴儿具有先天性阻止这种液体从肺部流出的阻塞，他们时常是生有畸形肺部的。
